general.__comment: The number of pathfinding steps that are taken per tick and per grid that is booting. Lower numbers will mean booting takes longer, but less work is done per tick.

facades.__comment: Unsupported: Allows whitelisting block entities as facades. Could work, have render issues, or corrupt your world. USE AT YOUR OWN RISK.

crafting.__comment: Enable shift-clicking with the crafting units in hand to disassemble them.

logging.__comment: Enable stack trace logging for the chunk loading debug command

battery.__comment: The chargers charging rate factor, which is applied to the charged items charge rate. 2 means it charges everything twice as fast. 0.5 half as fast.

worldGen.__comment: Biome IDs in which quartz ores should NOT be generated (i.e. minecraft:plains).

PortableCells.__comment: Allow disassembly of portable cells into the recipe ingredients using shift+right-click

tickRates.__comment: Min / Max Tickrates for dynamic ticking, most of these components also use sleeping, to prevent constant ticking, adjust with care, non standard rates are not supported or tested.

inWorldCrystalGrowth.__comment: The speed multiplier to use when the crystals are submerged in the improved fluid.
